product_name: Cannondale Classic Long-Sleeve Bike Jersey - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With a timeless look for rides in cool weather, the men's Cannondale Classic long-sleeve bike jersey uses moisture-wicking, recycled fabric to keep you comfortably cranking away the miles. Quick-drying recycled polyester fabric wicks away moisture to prevent the chills, and fabric shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays with a UPF rating of 50+. The men's Cannondale Classic long-sleeve bike jersey features a full front zipper for quick ventilation. 3 elasticized rear pockets keep ride essentials at the ready. Droptail hem increases rear coverage; flatlock seams increase comfort throughout. Semifitted. Closeout.
short_description: With a timeless look for rides in cool weather, the men's Cannondale Classic long-sleeve bike jersey uses moisture-wicking, recycled fabric to keep you comfortably cranking away the miles.
